column2: "...Guardian! Oh... I'm so glad to see you again! I was so dreadfully lost."
"...Guardian! Oh... I'm so glad to see you again! I was so dreadfully lost."
"I know not how it occurred, but when we came to, we were here... Everyone around us seemed just as surprised as we."
"At any rate, these decorations are very beautiful. Are they in celebration of some occasion?"

"I see, so this is Christmas...
A memorial to the great Santa, who brought happiness and cheer to the people by giving them gifts."

"I see, so this is Christmas...
A memorial to the great Santa, who brought happiness and cheer to the people by giving them gifts."
"I must say, it sounds rather fun... Guardian, I have a request for you. Would you lend me your aid?"

"*Sniff*, *sniff*...
Ah, <%me>?!
You must excuse me, this is so embarrassing..."

"*Sniff*, *sniff*...
Ah, <%me>?!
You must excuse me, this is so embarrassing..."

"No, these are not tears of sadness...
Rather, they are tears of joy. I have no more memories left to make."

"...The time has come.
Please, Guardian... Tell us what we are."

"Knowing the truth will surely make us disappear...
But I am prepared for that."
"I suspected as much all along... Something similar occurred in a picture book my brother read to me a long time ago."
"I suspected as much all along... Something similar occurred in a picture book my brother read to me a long time ago."

"It told of a youth who did not realize he was a ghost, and upon learning the truth, vanished forever...
We share that sad fate, do we not?"

"Wha...?!
Harriet, that..."

"Wha...?!
Harriet, that..."

"Oh, <%me>.
This is very sudden, but hello. Are you having lots of Christmas fun?"

"Oh, <%me>.
This is very sudden, but hello. Are you having lots of Christmas fun?"
"Lisa's sorry for leaving so quickly, but Harriet has something to say, so Lisa has to go away now."
"...Greetings, Guardian. There is something I need to tell you. About what is going on in the Shop Area."
"I heard of the Phantoms from Xiera. It is possible... that I was the one who embodied them."

"I felt a longing to engage in Christmas traditions...
Perhaps my desire to spend time with someone important to me was embodied."
"Please, tell them that they are not ghosts, and they will not disappear even if they learn the truth."
"You and they should continue to enjoy yourselves. Merry Christmas!"
"Lisa"
"Harriet"
"With its access to rare materials from all manner of planets, Oracle is a perfect environment in which to make gifts."
"I have long considered what I should give, and I have concluded that the best way to convey my feelings would simply be to make the gifts myself."
"I have long considered what I should give, and I have concluded that the best way to convey my feelings would simply be to make the gifts myself."
"I put great care and attention into making each one. I do hope that people like them."
"According to your legends, Santa brought miracles, dreams and happiness to all people, did he not?"
"According to your legends, Santa brought miracles, dreams and happiness to all people, did he not?"
"To my mind, he resembles a wise, benevolent ruler, who inspires his subjects with hope for the future."
"I never expected that I would be able to spend such quality time with my brother in this way."
"Hehe, perhaps this is what one might call a \"Christmas miracle\"?"
"Hehe, perhaps this is what one might call a \"Christmas miracle\"?"
"I really must thank you, Guardian! Thanks to you, I have been able to enjoy so many things this Christmas."

"Seeing people so happy when I gave them my handmade gifts, and spending time with my brother...
My heart is overflowing with gratitude."

"Seeing people so happy when I gave them my handmade gifts, and spending time with my brother...
My heart is overflowing with gratitude."

"Guardian, by way of thanking you for your unceasing support...
I have prepared a Christmas dinner for you."
"Please enjoy my specially prepared Omega Cockatrice roast!"
